name: Running Out of Time (Wobble Blocks)
description:
HOTFIX: Fixed audio balance.

Original Version still available for download. WebGL version updated.

PLAYABLE IN WEBGL! (fullscreen preferred)

You have been poisoned. Track down the man who did it to you and get answers.

Story: In this game you have poisoned, the object of the game is to keep taking pills to fight off the timer, that once it expires, so do you. Track down the villain throughout various locations in an open city. Too weak to fight, you will have to use stealth to get things done.

Gameplay: Follow along convenient waypoints as you find pills throughout the city to delay the inevitable. Each location will involve avoiding guards and lasers as you work towards your goal of finding out what happened to you. Follow the green lights and waypoints to help you through the levels.

Controls

Left click: Use/Interact.

E: Consume pills.

Space: Jump.

Control: Crouch.

Credits:

Aaron Mairs: Programmer / Voice Actor (Player/Guard-1).

Arthur Mairs: Project Lead / 3D Modeller / Writer.

Zack Grimley: 3D Modeller / Voice Actor (Karl/Bin-man/Guard-2) / Writer.

Kaden Williams: Voice Actor (General Population).

Oliver Grumley: Emotional Support.
